attributes.action: 20 mph zone it's more dangerous then safe in the night
attributes.background: 20 mph zone it's more dangerous then safe in the night. Iv been  verbally, physically assaulted for doing 20mph. Dangerously Over, undertaken no one dose 20mph after 8pm. Raise the speed limit to 25mph or 30mph after 10pm

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
